summary: 2002 SAAB 9-5 LINEAR SEDAN, PASSENGER SIDE SEAT MOVED BACK ON IT OWNS.  *BF  THE SEAT PINNED THE CONSUMERS DAUGHTER AND SHE WAS UNABLE TO MOVE.  THE CONSUMER STATED SOME PAPERS FELL BETWEEN THE SEAT AND THE DOOR HITTING THE CONTROLS WHICH ACTIVATED THE SEAT MOVEMEN.T  EVEN AFTER THE CONSUMER TURNED THE VEHICLE OFF THE SEAT DID NOT STOP MOVING, ONCE THE CONSUMER GOT OUT OF THE VEHICLE AND OPENED  THE DOOR THE SEAT STOPPED.  *JB
